name: REST Request Generator
description: Makes a REST request and fetches the reply.

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: Optionally specify on which nodes to run and how many instances you want on each node.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of node handler, one of SingleNode, SomeNodes, AllNodes (leave empty for local execution)

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: The nodes to use for this node handler type

parameters.name: instances
parameters.description: The amount of instances per node of this handler type

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL to make a request to.

parameters.name: add_code
parameters.description: Whether or not to add the HTTP status code obtained from the reply of the HTTP request to the DataPacket.

parameters.name: code_field
parameters.description: If the HTTP status code is to be added, this is the result name of it.

parameters.name: parse_as
parameters.description: How to parse the result (JSON, XML, text).
